Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Rosecrest Street, northeast of Khelleva Circle.
Room.LongDescription: Rosecrest Street breaks off from Khelleva Circle at a diagonal to avoid the Khelleva Estate. It continues to the northeast and eventually turns north. To the southwest is Khelleva Circle, a rather nice circular path which alleviates some of the conjestion that usually occurs when three streets merge together.
